title: Flippr: Evolution of the Ironing Board
description:
Sarah Boone invented the ironing board in 1892 and it has not been improved upon, until now.

Introducing the Flippr, the first ironing board built with a human being in mind, just place the shirt on the board, iron, rotate and repeat.

The Flippr can save up to 80% of ironing time, leaving you more time to do what matters. 

Brought to you by Sharkk Labs. 

Now on Kickstarter! back us here for a huge discount off retail: https://goo.gl/41NdVu

See more at http://www.flippr.com/
